description: 'Ramcharger':  After hours on the road in the big Peterbilt, ed Wiley looks forward to the fast, free spirit of his Ramcharger. Bob instinctively senses Ed's lust...and feels Ed spreads Bob's ass and eats his hole...warming it for the the fucking to follow...resuting in both men releasing the gushing pressure of their heavy loads.
title: Ramcharger
